author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Indo-Italian Chamber of Commerce and Industry, which is part of the Italian Embassy, will organise Italian and German language classes starting from April 2 at 2B Jamals, No: 17, Jagannathan Road, Nungambakkam.

According to a press release, Indian companies, joint venture companies, students interested in international exchange programmes and the general public can enrol for the course.

For details contact 044-28242399, 09543010435, website:www.languagelabchennai.com,www.indiaitlay.com.
title: Foreign language classes
